sudoku.cs
Interface Server

All Superinterfaces:
Remote
All Known Implementing Classes:
ServerModel
public interface Server
extends Remote

Remote interface for the Sudoku Server.

Field Summary
static String NAME
          The name by which the server is registered in the RMI registry.
 
Method Summary
 boolean addPlayer(Client inClient)
          Adds a client's player to the game.
 void removePlayer(Client inClient)
          Removes a client's player from the game.
 boolean wordLookup(String word)
          Looks up a word in the Server's dictionary.

Method Detail

addPlayer

boolean addPlayer(Client inClient)
                  throws RemoteException
Adds a client's player to the game.

Parameters:
inClient - the client whose player just joined the game.
Returns:
whether or not the player was added.
Throws:
RemoteException

removePlayer

void removePlayer(Client inClient)
                  throws RemoteException
Removes a client's player from the game.

Parameters:
inClient - the client whose player just exited the game.
Throws:
RemoteException

wordLookup

boolean wordLookup(String word)
                   throws RemoteException
Looks up a word in the Server's dictionary.

Parameters:
word - the word to be looked up.
Returns:
whether or not the word was found in the dictionary.
Throws:
RemoteException
